Monster Camp.name: Monster Camp
Monster Camp.description: You come across a small group of monsters. Their musk of fills the air.

success.text: You successfully sneak past the camp.

failure.text: The monsters spot you and chase you off, pursuing you for some time.

success.text: You nab the monsters treasure horde while they're not looking. The monsters are none the wiser.

failure.text: The monsters spot you with your hand in their treasure pile.  You need to drop a few things to make your escape.

success.text: You give the monsters a beating they won't soon forget, sending them running with whatever treasure they can carry.

failure.text: The monsters prove to be too strong and beat you back.  You need to drop a few things to make your escape.

success.text: You decide not to trifle with the monsters and give them plenty of space.

Mountain Path.name: Mountain Path
Mountain Path.description: You encounter a path that leads around the mountain towering before you.

success.text: You don't deviate from the path, staying safe and moving fast.
You find a small ore deposit and continue on after gathering it up.

failure.text: There doesn't appear to be any ore in the area, at least that you can see.
You fail to find an adequate route up to the peak.

Snow Covered Peak.name: Snow Covered Peak
Snow Covered Peak.description: You trek your way up to the top of the mountain. It's a rough climb, but when you get there, the view is immaculate.

success.text: You and your family sit triumphantly, looking into the world beyond.
Having ascended the mountain, you see nothing of value and hurry back down to continue on your journey.
